statement_text: The avian flu outbreak has killed tens of million of chickens and turkeys on farms, and the virus is able to jump to mammals. The avian flu outbreak has killed tens of million of chickens and turkeys on farms, and the virus is able to jump to mammals. It [the virus] rarely affects humans.
